name: dragos-worldview-threat-intelligence
label: Dragos WorldView Threat Intelligence
description: Dragos WorldView industrial threat intelligence provides actionable information and recommendations on threats to operations technology (OT) environments.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: FQDN of the Dragos server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Access Token
fields.name: api_token
fields.description: API Access Token of the Dragos server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Secret Key
fields.name: api_secret
fields.description: API Secret Key of the Dragos server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get All Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves paginated list of all indicators from Dragos based on various parameters such as indicator type, value and other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Indicator Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Specify indicator value to get details from Dragos.
parameters.tooltip: Specify indicator value to get details from Dragos

parameters.title: Indicator Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: (Optional) Type of indicator whose details you want to retrieve from Dragos. Choose from the following indicator types: Domain, Filename, Hostname, IP, MD5, SHA1, SHA256.
parameters.tooltip: Choose the type of indicator

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of records that the operation should include per page. Page size default value is 500. Page size must be less than 1001
parameters.tooltip: Number of records response should include. Default Page size is 500. Page size must be less than 1001
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Default value: 1
parameters.description: (Optional) Page number from which you want to retrieve records. Default value: 1

parameters.title: Updated After
parameters.tooltip: Datetime from which you wish to retrieve indicators
parameters.description: (Optional) Datetime of updated after from which you want to retrieve indicators. The datetime must be in the ISO format (UTC). If you specify the datetime then only those indicators that are modified later are retrieved.
parameters.name: updated_after

parameters.title: Report Serial Numbers
parameters.tooltip: List of report serial numbers
parameters.description: Specify the list of serials you wish to retrieve indicators for. Search for indicators matching a report serial(s).
parameters.name: serial

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.tooltip: List of tags
parameters.description: Specify the list of tags for which indicators you wish to retrieve. Search for indicators matching tag(s) text.

operations.title: Get All Reports
operations.description: Retrieves list of all reports from Dragos based on various parameters such as sort by, serial and other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.tooltip: Sort the reports on the basis of selected option. Default value is Release Date

parameters.tooltip: Specify the sorting order to receive the results in.
parameters.description: Select the sorting order in which you want to sort the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Default value: 1
